tossup_question: -   –  Which of the following types of animal viruses is responsible for hepatitis C?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Papovirus
X) Adenovirus [add-en-o-virus]
Y) Retrovirus
Z) Flavivirus [flay-vee-virus]
bonus_question: -   –  Which of the following is true regarding the neural crest cells in the amphibian embryo?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) They induce formation of the notochord
X) They develop into the main sections of the brain
Y) They produce cells that migrate to form teeth and skull bones in the embryo
Z) They roll up and form the neural tube
bonus_answer: ANSWER: Y) THEY PRODUCE CELLS THAT MIGRATE TO FORM TEETH AND SKULL BONES IN THE EMBRYO
